name: super student.io
description:
we do not have the art for the game we wished and it does not work the way we wished but here's what we have. If you would like to take a look at some of the artwork have a look at the screenshots of the created sprites of a student, Gavin and Ted.

created by  UP900884 UP 877675 UP864205

Since we didn't add the tiles we created to the world for the rooms we used a preset tileset we didn't create.
